ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] guild web site
ygData.msgSnippet: I can tell you that Seekers of Lore on Rodcet Nife is a very good guild, although we are small. There are a lot of good guilds tho -- best thing to do is group
ygData.messageBody:
I can tell you that Seekers of Lore on Rodcet Nife is
a very good guild, although we are small.

There are a lot of good guilds tho -- best thing to do
is group with members you enjoy hunting with and then
ask about their guild.


Tyunes
16th lvl and moving up...

--- Jennifer McComb <mccomb@...>
wrote:
